description: Beam Crop Tech, founded in 2020, aims to translate groundbreaking agricultural research into practical solutions for crop enhancement. With a focus on optimizing plant genes for improved photosynthesis and resilience against climate change, the company collaborates with leading seed firms to develop genetically optimized crops. Their innovative technology promises to increase yields, enhance food security, and reduce agriculture's carbon footprint, paving the way for sustainable farming practices.
name: Beam Crop Tech
